alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 4:42AM EDT until March 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional snow totals up to 1 to 3 inches this morning, with locally higher amounts up to 4 inches possible. Another round of snow beginning this evening will bring additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with higher amounts possible in the higher terrain of northern Marquette county. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph near the Lake Superior shoreline. * WHERE...Marquette County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact multiple morning and evening commutes through Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heavy snow will come in two rounds. The first round continues this morning, ending in the late morning. The second will be heavy lake effect snow this evening into Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
